conversation_history.content:
Hi there! It's great to connect with you today. I'm excited to learn more about your background and see if there's a potential fit for the role you're interested in.

Before we dive in, could you please share your full name with me? It'll help me get started on your profile and ensure I have the correct information moving forward.

Hi there! Thanks for taking the time to chat with me today. I'm excited to learn more about you and see if we can find a great fit for you.

I noticed that you only provided your first name as "hi" earlier. Could you please share your full name with me? I want to make sure I get it right.

Also, to make it easier for us to communicate, could you please share your email address and phone number with me? This will allow me to reach out to you with any updates or next steps in the process.

Looking forward to hearing back from you!
